title: 游戏崩溃啊~什么情况，大神救命啊OTZ
author: 光·RZ
txt_content:
一进游戏就崩溃
弹出一些字（表示不懂= =）

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking screen

A full error report has been saved to I:\mc客户端\超休闲向娱乐探险客户端V0.99\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-21_18.22.05-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.txt_content: 1.吧内存调到512  2.游戏崩溃很正常么嘛  改内存不行就是Mod太多~   不要用那个懒人包咯

replies.author: 额无语
replies.txt_content: LZ可能你是误删了.minecraft里的东西，所以导致崩溃。或者是mod冲突了，如果实在不行，重新下载一个mineract吧。
